: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus sirs on the edge of the bed, and hugs Nightlight tight.
Rodimus Prime: This war is a dark place in all our sparks. But, now there is a light in my spark. You, the baby, and the life we will have together.
He kissed her forehead.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:Nightlight/Baby:

Nightlight smiled and said "Do you know something, my love? In first 
battle, before I met you I felt unhappy 'cause I dislike this war, 
almost I wished that my pod never had been discovered, but now... 
It's diferent... If my neve had been discovered, I never would meet 
you.. Now in spite of this war, I'm happy to be in your side..."

dnffed, sniffed...

Baby smelled a strange scent close to her mommy, and that sounds... 
One was mommy and the other? Mommy didn't seemed to scared, then she 
knew what was that noise, razoned her youth mind. Baby didn't was 
worried and yawed and fell sleep in  his mommy arms

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus struggled to activate his comm while holding his family, 
and finally got it.
> Rodimus Prime: Sure Magnus. Just come to my quarters, we can talk 
there.
> Roddy entered his room, and sat Nightlight and the baby down on the 
bed.
> Rodimus Prime: You just sleep, beautiful.
>  aerosmith4e@a... wrote:Ultra Magnus sent a comm to Rodimus, "May i 
see you for a moment Rodimus?"
> > 
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :

> > Rodimus turns to see that Nightlight was trying to get up but was 
still too 
> > weak. He picks her up into his arms, along with the baby. 
> > Rodimus Prime: Well we should go to our quarters, love. You need 
to rest and the 
> > baby will need an Ionic shower(I'm stealing things from Star Trek 
again). 
> > Rodimus walks out of the Sick Bay, holding his family, and heads 
for his 
> > quarters. 
> > A lot was on his mind right now. So much had happened recently. 
His falling in 
> > love with Nightlight, the birth of their daughter, it was all 
good. He had a 
> > family. However he was still the General Commander of a Maximal 
force in the 
> > middle of the Neo Beast Wars. Not to mention that he was the 
Matrix's "Chosen 
> > One," Rodimus Prime. That meant that no telling how many past 
Decepticons and 
> > Predacons wanted him dead. Life was complicated....
